job_description:
Join us as an Accounting Intern to support the Shared Service and Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) teams in maintaining accurate financial records and supporting key finance activities. Your responsibilities will include:

1. Assisting with daily accounting tasks such as data entry, invoice processing, and document organization.
2. Supporting the Shared Service team in reconciliations, checking financial documents, and maintaining financial databases.
3. Helping the FP&A team with basic financial analysis and report preparation.
4. Providing general administrative and coordination support for finance-related activities.

This position is ideal for graduates interested in accounting, finance operations, and gaining hands-on experience in a corporate finance environment.
